pages.text: The neural tissue of Feral versions tends to be difficult to gather in sizeable amounts.$(br)However, it appears that Vagrants are capable of synthesizing it in larger quantities using a Factory.
Many Vagrants were found with multiple of such samples collected. Perhaps they found them useful for fabricating other items?
$(#630000)Obtaining my first Feral was a little difficult. Luckily, when I reached Tier 2, I was able to use $(l:vagrant/factory_upgrading) to upgrade an Assimilated to a Feral.
It can also be broken down into Assmilated Flesh, if desired.
